Bio.title: Web Developer and Electronics Engineer
Bio.name: Santiago Suarez
Bio.slogan: Learning is the essence of life
Bio.resume: Developer, Chess player and 10th semester student of Electronic Engineering at the National University of Colombia. Self-taught with visualization, discipline, teamwork and leadership skills, knowledge in: Agile methodologies, Implementation of electronic systems, IOT oriented digital systems and software frontend development based on Javascript and React.

Studing electronic engineering at National University of Colombia

works.title: Healty Home
works.desc: Mobile App and IoT system to monitorate the health state of a person.

hobbiesList.desc: I was playing and training Chess for 5 years in different categories and improving my thinking process.

hobbiesList.title: Linux
hobbiesList.desc: I have learned about linux based operating systems and i have discovered new distributions, how it works and much more. I just fell in love with it.

hobbiesList.desc: I have been training my body for 3 years, looking to improve and be ready to give the best of me.

Bio.title: Desarrolador Web e Ingeniero Electronico
Bio.name: Santiago Suarez
Bio.slogan: El aprendizaje es la escencia de la vida
Bio.resume: Desarrollador, ajedrecista y estudiante de décimo semestre de Ingeniería Electrónica en la Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Autodidacta con visualización, disciplina, habilidades de liderazgo y para trabajar en equipo. Conocimientos en: Metodologías ágiles, implementación de sistemas electrónicos, sistemas digitales orientados a IoT y desarrollador de software basado principalmente en Javascript y React JS.
bioSection: Complete mis estudios básicos en GIMFA (Gimnasio Militar de la Fuerza Aerea) - Melgar, Tolima
